CIPHER.28.cipherString: But I love Halloween, and I love that feeling: the cold air, the spooky dangers lurking around the corner.
CIPHER.28.question: Solve this quote by Evan Peters about this time of year.

CIPHER.30.cipherString:
When black cats prowl and pumpkins gleam,
May luck be yours on Halloween.
CIPHER.30.question: Decode this phrase which has been encoded with the Atbash Cipher.

CIPHER.31.cipherString:
Bring forth the raisins and the nuts-
Tonight All-Hallowsâ€™ Spectre struts
Along the moonlit way.
CIPHER.31.question: Decode this quote by John Kendrick Bangs which has been encoded using a Caesar cipher.

CIPHER.29.cipherString:
Double, double toil and trouble;
Fire burn and cauldron bubble.
CIPHER.29.question: Encode this famous phrase "Double, double toil and trouble;  Fire burn and cauldron bubble." by William Shakespeare using the Affine Cipher with a=25 and b=25

CIPHER.35.cipherString: Sticky Fingers, Tired Feet; One last house, "Trick or Treat"
CIPHER.35.question: Encode the phrase "Sticky Fingers, Tired Feet; One last house, 'Trick or Treat'" using the Affine cipher with a=7 and b=4.

CIPHER.32.cipherString: October proved a riot a riot to the senses and climaxed those giddy last weeks before Halloween.
CIPHER.32.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote by Keith Donohue about this time of year and has the word THE in it once.

CIPHER.33.cipherString:
Forgive people when they laugh at your dreams, I assure you,
In a matter of time, they soon will start dreaming.
CIPHER.33.question: Solve Aristocrat with is a piece of advice by Charmaine J. Forde containg the word YOU once.

CIPHER.34.cipherString: It looked like the world was covered in a cobbler crust of brown sugar and cinnamon.
CIPHER.34.question: Solve K1 encoded Aristocrat with is a quote by Sarah Addison Allen in her book "First Frost".

CIPHER.36.cipherString: In the entire circle of the year there are no days so delightful as those of a fine October.
CIPHER.36.question: Solve this K1 encoded Patristocrat which is a quote by Alexander Smith and starts with INTHE.
